author: Kosaku Narioka
title: Approves Toshiba’s $18 Billion Sale of Its Memory-Chip Unit
text:
TOKYO—China has approved U.S. private-equity firm Bain Capital’s $18 billion deal for Toshiba Corp.’s memory-chip unit, in a possible gesture of goodwill as Beijing tries to stave off U.S. trade penalties.
The acquisition is set to be completed on June 1, Toshiba said.
Chinese antitrust regulators had been weighing the deal for months, and...
